item.title: Leonardo DiCaprio spotted vacationing with girlfriend Vittoria Ceretti, enjoy beach day together - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Leonardo DiCaprio and Girlfriend Vittoria Ceretti Enjoy a Beach Vacation

Date: Dec 30, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Leonardo DiCaprio is enjoying a romantic vacation with his girlfriend Vittoria Ceretti in St Barts, where they were spotted swimming and sharing playful moments.

  • DiCaprio and Ceretti are seen swimming together and enjoying their time at the beach.
  • They were photographed smiling and holding each other amidst clear waters.
  • The couple has been linked since last summer and has been spotted vacationing in various locations together.
  • DiCaprio was last seen in a major film, "Killers of the Flower Moon," which received multiple Oscar nominations.
"Leo and Vittoria swam around together... engaging in some light PDA while treading water off the coast of the island country. Lots of big smiles and laughs between the two... looking quite carefree as their holiday continues on."

This lighthearted vacation comes as DiCaprio continues to thrive both personally and professionally, marking a joyous period in his life.

item.title: 'Problem toh hai..': Jhanak's Chandni Sharma on DATING Krushal Ahuja & unfollowing him on Instagram - India Forums
item.description:
Chandni Sharma Opens Up About Unfollowing Krushal Ahuja Amid Dating Rumors

Published: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 1:35 PM | Source: India Forums

Chandni Sharma and Krushal Ahuja have made headlines after unfollowing each other on Instagram, raising questions about their rumored relationship. A close insider revealed that their relationship ended sourly, prompting the social media split.

  • Chandni and Krushal, co-stars on the show Jhanak, have unfollowed each other on Instagram.
  • They were previously rumored to be in a relationship that reportedly ended poorly.
  • Chandni confirmed the unfollowing, citing privacy in their personal matters, but praised Krushal's professionalism.
  • She denied any dating rumors, insisting they were never romantically involved.
  • Fans are hopeful for their reconciliation on-screen despite personal tensions.
“Yes, we have unfollowed each other. There is a problem, and that's the reason we did so. However, we both want to keep this matter private.” - Chandni Sharma

Despite the personal fallout, both actors continue to hold professional respect for each other, leaving fans hoping for a positive resolution.

item.title: After breakup from Arjun Kapoor, Malaika Arora calls 2024 ‘difficult year’: ‘There are still things I can’t understand' - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Malaika Arora Reflects on a Challenging 2024

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

Malaika Arora shares her reflections on the year 2024, calling it a difficult period filled with challenges, including her breakup with actor Arjun Kapoor and the loss of her stepfather.

  • Malaika describes 2024 as a difficult year when she experienced significant personal losses.
  • She parted ways with Arjun Kapoor, confirming her single status amidst public speculation.
  • In an Instagram post, Malaika highlighted the importance of health and self-trust during tough times.
  • She shares a firm stance on privacy, choosing not to disclose personal matters publicly.
Malaika stated, "I don't hate you 2024 but you were a difficult year, full of challenges, changes, and learning... my health, whether physical, emotional or mental, is what really matters."

This year has tested Malaika's resilience, but she continues to emphasize growth and understanding as she moves forward.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Hindi Worldwide Box Office: Creates History, Becomes 1st Hindi-Dubbed South Film To Enter The 1000 Crore Club! - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Makes Box Office History, First Hindi-Dubbed South Film to Cross 1000 Crore

Publication Date: December 2024 | Source: Koimoi

The Hindi-dubbed version of Pushpa 2 has achieved a remarkable milestone by entering the 1000 crore club after 25 days in theaters, making history as the first Hindi-dubbed South film to do so.

  • The film wrapped up its fourth weekend with a total gross of 908.89 crore in India.
  • Overseas gross was reported at 115 crore, leading to a worldwide total of 1023.89 crore.
  • Pushpa 2 follows the success of its predecessor, which gained immense popularity across social media and OTT platforms.
  • This makes Pushpa 2 the fourth Hindi film after Dangal, Pathaan, and Jawan to achieve such box office success.
“Simply unbelievable! The film still has enough fuel left, and it’ll be interesting to see how far it goes.”

Pushpa 2’s historic achievement reflects its significant cultural impact, setting new benchmarks for Hindi-dubbed films.

item.title: Ananya Panday calls long-distance relationship ‘healthy’ amidst dating rumours with Walker Blanco - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Ananya Panday Discusses Long-Distance Relationships Amidst Dating Rumors

Date: Dec 30, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Ananya Panday is currently rumored to be dating Walker Blanco, and she recently shared her thoughts on long-distance relationships during an interview, stating they can be 'healthy.'

  • Ananya attended Anant Ambani and Radhika Merchant’s wedding with Walker Blanco.
  • In a new interview, she highlighted the benefits of having space in a relationship.
  • She reflected on her growth and comfort in her identity within relationships.
  • Her upcoming projects include a second season of 'Call Me Bae' and a romantic drama 'Chaand Mera Dil.'
“I actually think it is quite healthy sometimes to have some space. Two months is okay. Actually, distance does make the heart grow fonder.” - Ananya Panday

Ananya Panday's evolving perspective on relationships reflects her personal growth, suggesting that distance may indeed enhance connections.

item.title: Shalini Passi says she married at 20, had a son at 21 but had one important condition for husband: ‘He should not…’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Shalini Passi: Marrying Young and Having a Child at 21, with No Regrets

Date: 2024-12-01, Source: Indian Express

Shalini Passi, known for her appearances in 'Fabulous Lives vs Bollywood Wives,' has shared her perspective on getting married at 20 and becoming a mother at 21. In an interview with Mojo Story, she expressed no regrets about her decision, describing it as a 'great move by the universe.'

  1. Shalini had an arranged marriage with Sanjay Passi, the owner of the PASCO group, after his family spotted her at a wedding.
  2. She had a condition for her arranged marriage: her husband should not drink, smoke, or gamble.
  3. Despite initial challenges, Shalini mastered the art of hosting and adapted to her new lifestyle.
  4. She is known for her love for art and philanthropic work.
“It was a very good move by the universe because I had so much energy and enthusiasm back then. What happens with women is later in their life, the energy and recovery gets extremely different. When young, you recover early. I became a mom at 21. Because I was young, I used to get more excited than my son when I took him to a toy store. Its like I am almost living my life in reverse.”

Shalini Passi reflects on her young marriage and motherhood, emphasizing her enthusiasm and energy during that period.

item.title: Shweta Tiwari Reacts To Palak Tiwari And Ibrahim Ali Khan Dating Rumours: 'They Will Forget...' - News18
item.description:
Shweta Tiwari Unfazed by Palak Tiwari and Ibrahim Ali Khan's Dating Rumors

Date & Source: Last Updated: December 30, 2024, 17:51 IST

Actress Shweta Tiwari has reacted to the persistent dating rumors surrounding her daughter, Palak Tiwari, and actor Ibrahim Ali Khan. While the two have repeatedly dismissed the rumors, Shweta has now revealed that she no longer lets such speculations bother her.

In a recent interview, Shweta expressed her indifference towards the rumors, stating that people's memory spans are short and that negativity sells in the media. She also mentioned that she has dealt with similar situations in the past and has learned to not let them affect her.

Palak and Ibrahim's dating rumors first surfaced in 2022 when they were photographed together. However, they have maintained that they are just friends. Palak, in an interview with Siddharth Kannan, clarified that they were with a group of people when they were snapped together and that there was no romantic involvement between them.

On the work front, Palak was last seen in Salman Khan's Kisi Ka Bhai Kisi Ki Jaan.

item.title: Sangeeta Bijlani confirms she almost married Salman Khan, says ex didn’t let her wear short dress: ‘I changed that part of my life’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Sangeeta Bijlani confirms she almost married Salman Khan, says ex didn’t let her wear short dress: ‘I changed that part of my life’

Publication Date: Not specified

Source: The Indian Express

Sangeeta Bijlani reminisces about her long relationship with Salman Khan, revealing they were on the verge of marriage before he called it off at the last minute. She discusses the restrictions placed on her during their relationship and expresses how she has changed since then.

  • Sangeeta Bijlani dated Salman Khan for nearly a decade.
  • The couple had finalized their wedding plans before Salman called it off.
  • Bijlani shared her past restrictions on clothing choices imposed by her ex.
  • She expressed a desire to change that restrictive period of her life.
  • Bijlani confirmed that wedding invitations were printed before their breakup.
“I was very constricted that ‘you can’t wear short dresses... I was a little shy then. Now, I am a total gundi.” - Sangeeta Bijlani

In conclusion, Sangeeta Bijlani reflects on her past relationship with Salman Khan, acknowledging how she has transformed and embraced her individuality since those years.

item.title: Hidden Love actor Zhao Lusi's pic in wheelchair goes viral, team shares statement - India Today
item.description:
Chinese Actress Zhao Lusi Hospitalized: Team Suspends Work for Recovery

Published on Dec 30, 2024, by Zinia Bandyopadhyay

Chinese actress Zhao Lusi, known for her role in Hidden Love, was recently hospitalized, sparking concerns over her health. Her team shared a statement announcing a suspension of all work commitments to allow for a speedy recovery.

  • Zhao was seen in a wheelchair as she was rushed to the hospital on December 18, with footage of the incident going viral on social media.
  • Speculations about her health have been circulating, with online rumors pointing to severe depression or a neurological condition, possibly due to work-related stress.
  • Zhao's management confirmed she has suspended all work commitments due to a health crisis but withheld details about her condition.
"After Ms. Zhao Lusi confirmed to play the role of Ruan Yu in the project 'Lovers', she actively carried out preparatory work and fulfilled the purpose of the contract. [...] We will prioritise the health of Ms. Zhao Lusi and suspend all subsequent work. We also hope that everyone who cares about Lusi will give her space to rest physically and mentally."

Zhao, 26, began her acting journey in 2017 and has starred in hit series like The Romance of Tiger and Rose, Dating in the Kitchen, Love Better Than Immortality, Love Like the Galaxy, and Hidden Love.

item.title: Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin: Savi finally expresses her love for Rajat at the airport; says 'I Love You' - India Forums
item.description:
Savi Confesses Her Love for Rajat at the Airport in Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin

Published: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 9:56 AM | Source: Star Plus

In a dramatic turn of events on the popular show Ghum Hai Kisikey Pyaar Meiin, Savi realizes her feelings for Rajat just as he is about to leave for Singapore. This confrontation leads to a heartfelt moment where both characters express their love for each other.

  • Savi rushes to the airport with Rajat’s mom, Bhagyashree, as Rajat prepares to leave.
  • Rajat believes he is a burden to Savi and plans to move to Singapore permanently.
  • After a series of misunderstandings and manipulations by a character named Arsh, Rajat and Savi's relationship faces turmoil.
  • Ultimately, Savi confronts Rajat at the airport and they share an emotional embrace, leading Rajat to cancel his trip.
“I love you,” Savi expresses as she tries to stop Rajat from leaving.

This pivotal moment showcases the deep emotional connection between Savi and Rajat, hinting at future developments in their relationship.

item.title: BTS postpones content releases, expresses condolences for Jeju Air tragedy - allkpop
item.description:
BTS Postpones Content Releases and Honors Victims of Jeju Air Tragedy

Publication Date: December 30, 2024 | Source: allkpop

BTS and their agency, BIGHIT MUSIC, have expressed their condolences for the victims of the Jeju Air tragedy that occurred on December 29th, resulting in significant loss of life.

  • BIGHIT MUSIC announced the postponement of content releases, including Episode 16 of 'Run Jin'.
  • The Jeju Air tragedy led to 179 fatalities out of 181 passengers.
  • Nationwide mourning is taking place, impacting events in the entertainment industry.
“We extend our deepest condolences and sympathies to the victims of the aviation accident and their families.” - BIGHIT MUSIC

This incident has profoundly affected the community, prompting many in the entertainment industry to show their respect by canceling or postponing events.

item.title: Only 1 Indian actor made it to The Independent's list of Best Actors of 21st century. It's not Shah Rukh Khan, Amitabh - Hindustan Times
item.description:
The Independent listed 60 best actors of the 21st century. Not Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan or Amitabh Bachchan, but this Indian actor made the cut.

Date: Dec 30, 2024 | Source: The Independent

The Independent has curated a list of the 60 best actors of the 21st century. Notably, the list includes international talents while specifically excluding performances from films released after 2000.

  • Irrfan Khan is the only Indian actor to be featured on the list, ranked at #41.
  • Other prominent Indian actors such as Shah Rukh Khan, Aamir Khan, and Amitabh Bachchan are absent from this list.
  • The late actor celebrated for his roles in films such as The Warrior, Haasil, and Life of Pi.
  • Philip Seymour Hoffman was recognized as the best actor, with female representation by Emma Stone, ranked at #2.
“It’s Irrfan Khan’s eyes, hooded and deep brown, that will live eternally. They granted him the ability to weave magic, to recite poetry without moving his lips.”

The recognition of Irrfan Khan amidst international talents highlights his impactful performances and legacy in cinema.

item.title: EXCLUSIVE: Sanjay Leela Bhansali signs KD director Prem for Rowdy Rathore 2; Scripting in progress - PINKVILLA
item.description:
Sanjay Leela Bhansali Signs Director Prem for Rowdy Rathore 2; Scripting in Progress

Date & Source: Dec 30, 2024 | 02:59 PM IST | Pinkvilla

Over the years, there has been constant chatter on the sequel to Akshay Kumar’s 2012 blockbuster, Rowdy Rathore, which was produced by Sanjay Leela Bhansali and directed by Prabhudeva. Several names have been floating around in the media to carry forward this cop-based action entertainer. Now, we have exclusively learned that Sanjay Leela Bhansali has signed Kannada film director Prem and has entrusted him with the responsibility of developing the script for Rowdy Rathore 2.

According to sources close to the development, Sanjay Leela Bhansali is very excited to bankroll the sequel to Rowdy Rathore and had locked the core plot of the film a while back. The basic idea of Rowdy Rathore 2 has been in place for the longest time, and SLB was looking to partner with the right forces to develop a banger of a sequel to this 2012 blockbuster. His thoughts have aligned with Prem, and the duo is working towards developing the script of Rowdy Rathore 2.

The source further added that the Rowdy Rathore sequel will move into the casting stage once the screenplay is locked. Prem will full-fledgedly move into the pre-production of Rowdy Rathore 2 after the release of KD – The Devil. The film is expected to take off sometime by the end of 2025, and the casting will begin from Summer next year. Right now, the energies are being invested to develop a script that does justice to the legacy of the first part.

Will Akshay Kumar return to Rowdy Rathore 2? "We shall know that at the right time. It could be Akshay Kumar, a new hero, or who knows, a two-hero film too," the source concluded.

item.title: Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office (25 Days): Allu Arjun’s Magnum Opus Is Just 19.53 Crores Away From Achieving A Big Milestone - Koimoi
item.description:
Pushpa 2 Worldwide Box Office: Allu Arjun's Magnum Opus Nears 1700 Crores

Date & Source: December 25, 2023, Koimoi

Introduction: Allu Arjun's 'Pushpa 2: The Rule' continues its dominant run at the box office, nearing a significant milestone.

  1. Earned 39.20 crore net in India during the fourth weekend.
  2. Total Indian box office collection stands at 1179.85 crore net (1392.22 crore gross).
  3. Overseas collection reached 288.25 crore gross, making the worldwide total 1680.47 crore gross.
  4. Needs only 19.53 crore to enter the 1700-crore club.
Pushpa 2 has had a historic run so far, and very soon, it will unleash one significant milestone: a score of 1700 crores at the worldwide box office.

Conclusion: 'Pushpa 2: The Rule' is set to achieve another major milestone in the coming days, cementing its status as one of the biggest blockbusters in recent times.

item.title: Shweta Tiwari REACTS to rumours of Ibrahim Ali Khan dating Palak Tiwari: 'As per rumours, my daughter is - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Shweta Tiwari Reacts to Rumors of Ibrahim Ali Khan Dating Palak Tiwari

Date & Source: 13th August, 2023, Times of India

Rumors have been circulating about Saif Ali Khan's son, Ibrahim Ali Khan, and Shweta Tiwari's daughter, Palak Tiwari, being in a relationship. They have been spotted together in the city and at social gatherings, and it was recently speculated that they were holidaying together in the Maldives. Shweta Tiwari has now reacted to these dating rumors.

"Rumours don’t bother me anymore... As per rumours, my daughter is dating every third guy, and I am getting married every year. As per the internet, I am already married thrice. These things don’t affect me now."
Shweta Tiwari
"We were just out, and we got papped. It ends there... We are nice friends. He is a very sweet guy. That’s all there is to it. We talk sometimes and that’s all."
Palak Tiwari

Earlier, Saif Ali Khan had also reacted to Ibrahim's dating life, saying, "He discusses his work and girlfriend/s with me, while Sara talks to me about her work."

item.title: Srikanth Odela about his film with Chiru – You won’t see vintage Megastar - 123telugu
item.description:
Srikanth Odela about his film with Chiru – You won’t see vintage Megastar

Published on Dec 30, 2024 2:33 pm IST

Megastar Chiranjeevi's collaboration with Dasara director Srikanth Odela is finally happening, much to the delight of fans. This long-awaited project promises to set a fresh tone for the iconic star.

  • Chiranjeevi teams up with new-age filmmaker Srikanth Odela.
  • The film will be set against a period backdrop.
  • Odela expresses his disbelief at working with Chiranjeevi, citing a lifelong admiration.
  • He emphasizes that viewers will not see the traditional vintage Megastar.
  • The script was finalized in just 48 hours with Chiranjeevi's enthusiasm inspiring Odela.
  • Odela's upcoming film follows 'The Paradise' with actor Nani.
“You won’t see the vintage Megastar. Instead, you will see him in an age-appropriate and fresh role.” - Srikanth Odela

This project marks an exciting new chapter for both Srikanth Odela and Chiranjeevi, as it aims to present the Megastar in a modern light.

item.title: Pawan finds no fault with both Allu Arjun, Revanth.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Pawan Kalyan Addresses Sandhya Theatre Incident Without Blame

Publication Date: December 4, 2023

Source: Great Andhra

Pawan Kalyan, the Jana Sena Party president and Andhra Pradesh's deputy chief minister, spoke on the tragic Sandhya Theatre stampede incident that resulted in the death of a woman and the hospitalization of her son, choosing not to assign blame to individuals involved.

  • Pawan Kalyan expressed that excitement for film stars can lead to overwhelming situations and reiterated that Allu Arjun should not be criticized for his behavior during the incident.
  • He emphasized the importance of proper precautions during such events and noted that the situation could have been managed better.
  • Kalyan highlighted the need for artists to show empathy towards affected individuals, suggesting that Allu Arjun should have taken steps to support the victims shortly after the incident occurred.
  • He acknowledged the police's efforts in maintaining security during events and praised the leadership of Revanth Reddy.
  • The deputy chief minister mentioned that in the film industry, collaboration is key and stressed that attributing sole blame to Allu Arjun is unfair.
Pawan Kalyan stated, “In cinema, it's a team effort, and everyone should be a part of it. In this case, Allu Arjun has been made the sole culprit, which I believe is not right.”

The discussion highlighted the need for better management of crowd situations at public events and the responsibilities of public figures in ensuring safety.

item.title: Danger bells to Ustaad Bhagat Singh - TrackTollywood
item.description:
Ustaad Bhagat Singh's Fate in Doubt After Baby John's Disaster

Published on: [Date], Source: Track Tollywood

The remake of Tamil blockbuster Theri, Ustaad Bhagat Singh starring Pawan Kalyan, finds itself in jeopardy as the Hindi remake, Baby John, is heading towards a big disaster.

  • Baby John's failure at the box office indicates audience displeasure towards remakes.
  • Pawan Kalyan and director Harish Shankar have not resumed Ustaad Bhagat Singh's shoot due to other commitments.
  • Fans and audiences are doubtful about Ustaad Bhagat Singh's success, fearing a similar fate as Baby John.
"Now fans and audiences are also doubtful of the result of Ustaad Bhagat Singh... They fear if this might become a big threat for Ustaad Bhagat Singh like it happened for Baby John."

The future of Ustaad Bhagat Singh remains uncertain, with Pawan Kalyan focused on other projects and no clear updates on the film's restart.

item.title: Barroz Box Office Collection Day 5: Mohanlal Starrer Is A Disappointing Affair, Wraps Up Its Extended Opening Weekend Below 10 Crores - Koimoi
item.description:
Barroz Box Office Collection Day 5: Mohanlal Starrer Struggles

Date & Source: December 25, 2023, Koimoi.com

Introduction: The Mohanlal-starrer Barroz is facing a disappointing run at the box office, failing to cross 10 crores in its extended opening weekend.

  1. The film collected 1.35 crores on its 5th day, showing only an 8% growth from the previous day.
  2. Barroz is struggling to cross 10 crores, with a current total India net collection of 8.71 crores.
  3. The movie faces tough competition from recent South releases like UI, Marco, and Viduthalai Part 2.
  4. Barroz is reportedly mounted on a budget of 80 crores, with less than 10% of its budget recovered so far.

The movie is reportedly mounted at a scale of 80 crores. It is yet to recover more than 90% of its budget. But that seems extremely difficult now since the audience has completely rejected the film.

Conclusion: Barroz is on its way to becoming a major box office disaster, with a bleak outlook for recovery.

item.title: Salman Khan says he’s jealous of Jamnagar residents as he spends time with Anant Ambani, Shah Rukh Khan reaches with family - The Indian Express
item.description:
Salman Khan Celebrates Birthday in Jamnagar with Shah Rukh Khan and Ambani Family

Publication Date: December 28, 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

Salman Khan recently celebrated his 59th birthday in Jamnagar, hosted by the Ambani family, and shared heartfelt moments with fans and friends.

  • Salman enjoyed a public outing at a mall with Anant Ambani and Radhika.
  • He expressed his envy towards Jamnagar residents, stating how beautiful he finds the place.
  • Shah Rukh Khan and family joined the Ambanis for New Year celebrations.
  • Salman is set to be featured in the upcoming movie Sikandar.
“Aap log itne lucky ho ki aap Jamnagar mein rehte ho... It’s like heaven.” - Salman Khan

This celebration highlighted the close ties between Bollywood celebrities and the Ambani family as they usher in the New Year together.

item.description:
Yeh Rishta Kya Kehlata Hai: Abhir Accuses Vidya After Regaining Consciousness

Published: Monday, December 30, 2024 at 8:28 AM

In the upcoming episode of the show, Abhir wakes up post-accident and identifies Vidya as the person involved, shocking both Armaan and Abhira.

  • After an accident involving Abhir and Vidya, Vidya unintentionally hits Abhir with her car due to brake failure.
  • Vidya panics and leaves the scene, leading to Abhir being rushed to the hospital.
  • Upon regaining consciousness, Abhir accuses Vidya, causing immediate distress for his family.
  • Abhira stands up for Abhir, believing he will be vindicated.
  • The episode highlights relationship dynamics, with Armaan seeking reconciliation with Abhira while facing challenges from Kaveri.
“Abhira stands firm in defending Abhir's innocence.”

This episode promises dramatic developments surrounding Abhir's accusation and its effect on relationships.
